inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status II;
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients enable to comprehend or use the verbal rating pain scoring system or patient controlled analgesia (PCA) pump;

notes: Patient is a 55 year old man visiting his primary care physician for lower urinary tract symptoms. He has no history of congenital coagulopathy, anatomical abnormalities or localized infections.
